data.title: Ministry Statute
data.meta_description: In this Statute, the following words shall have the meanings assigned thereto, unless the context requires otherwise:
data.text:
Article 1:

In this Statute, the following words shall have the meanings assigned thereto, unless the context requires otherwise:

Minister: Minister of Investment.

Ministry: Ministry of Investment.

Statute: Statute of the Ministry of Investment.

Article 2:

The Ministry shall be the agency in charge of regulating, developing, and promoting domestic and foreign investment in the Kingdom and protecting the rights of investors. It shall, without prejudice to the powers and responsibilities of other agencies, undertake any action necessary to achieve its objectives, including the following:

Article 4:

This Statute shall supersede the Statute of the General Investment Authority promulgated by the Council of Ministers Resolution No.2, dated 5/1/1421H and any amendments thereto.

Article 5:
